installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
#!/bin/bash
# Update and install dependencies
apt update
apt -y install mariadb-client
# Construct the DATABASE_URL from environment variables
DB_USER=${DB_USER}
DB_PASSWORD=${DB_PASSWORD}
DB_HOST=${DB_HOST}
DB_PORT=${DB_PORT}
DB_NAME=${DB_NAME}
DATABASE_URL="mysql://${DB_USER}:${DB_PASSWORD}@${DB_HOST}:${DB_PORT}/${DB_NAME}"
export DATABASE_URL=${DATABASE_URL}
# Connect to the database and create the table if it does not exist
mysql -h ${DB_HOST} -P ${DB_PORT} -u ${DB_USER} -p${DB_PASSWORD} -D ${DB_NAME} <<EOF
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Licensing (
license VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
ip VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
discordId VARCHAR(255),
email VARCHAR(255)
);
EOF
# Create the license_check view if it does not already exist
view_exists=$(mysql -h ${DB_HOST} -P ${DB_PORT} -u ${DB_USER} -p${DB_PASSWORD} -D ${DB_NAME} -N -B -e "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.VIEWS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'license_check';")
if [[ ${view_exists} -eq 0 ]]; then
# Create the license_check view only if it doesn't exist
mysql -h ${DB_HOST} -P ${DB_PORT} -u ${DB_USER} -p${DB_PASSWORD} -D ${DB_NAME} <<EOF
CREATE VIEW license_check AS
SELECT license, ip FROM Licensing;
EOF
fi
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
echo "Installing latest version of the licensing server from Github repo \"https://github.com/Loki-101/licensing\""
curl -LJO https://github.com/Loki-101/licensing/releases/latest/download/app.py -LJO https://github.com/Loki-101/licensing/releases/latest/download/requirements.txt
echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
